entry.string: Invalid authorization key for creating new #(1) item
entry.translation: Infeleed oothureezeshun key fur creeteeng noo #(1) item

entry.string: You must provide an email address.
entry.translation: Yuoo moost prufeede-a un imeeel eddress. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: You must select at least one publication.
entry.translation: Yuoo moost select et leest oone-a poobleeceshun.

entry.string: You must provide a title for the disclaimer.
entry.translation: Yuoo moost prufeede-a a teetle-a fur zee deescleimer.
Yuoo moost prufeede-a zee deescleimer. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: You must select an owner name.
entry.translation: Yuoo moost select un oovner neme-a.

entry.string: You must enter a publication title
entry.translation: Yuoo moost inter a poobleeceshun teetle

entry.string: You must enter a title for the story.
entry.translation: Yuoo moost inter a teetle-a fur zee stury.

entry.string: You must provide content for the story.
entry.translation: Yuoo moost prufeede-a cuntent fur zee stury. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: You must enter a commentary source for the commentary.
entry.translation: Yuoo moost inter a cummentery suoorce-a fur zee cummentery.

entry.string: Invalid authorization key for deleting #(1) item #(2)
entry.translation: Infeleed oothureezeshun key fur deleteeng #(1) item #(2)

entry.string: Invalid authorization key for updating #(1) item #(2) in function #(3)
entry.translation: Infeleed oothureezeshun key fur updeteeng #(1) item #(2) in fooncshun #(3)

entry.string: Invalid authorization key for updating #(1) configuration
entry.translation: Infeleed oothureezeshun key fur updeteeng #(1) cunffeegooreshun

entry.string: Modify the configuration for the module
entry.translation: Mudeeffy zee cunffeegooreshun fur zee mudoole

entry.string: This module was originally created for the
entry.translation: Thees mudoole-a ves ooreeginelly creeted fur zee

entry.string: to distribute weekly updates on the program and research areas relevant to the foundation's learning differences and human services programs and initiatives.
entry.translation: tu deestriboote-a veekly updetes oon zee prugrem und reseerch erees relefunt tu zee fuoondeshun's leerneeng deefffferences und hoomun serfeeces prugrems und ineetietifes.

entry.string: The default groups and privileges are:
entry.translation: Zee deffoolt gruoops und preefileges ere-a:

entry.string: Can create, edit and delete stories, issues, publications and subscriptions. Can publish issues. Can modify the configuration of the module.
entry.translation: Cun creete-a, ideet und delete-a stureees, issooes, poobleeceshuns und soobscreepshuns. Cun poobleesh issooes. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Cun mudeeffy zee cunffeegooreshun ooff zee mudoole-a.

entry.string: Can create, edit and delete stories or issues. Cannot publish issues.
entry.translation: Cun creete-a, ideet und delete-a stureees oor issooes. Cunnut poobleesh issooes.

entry.string: Can add, edit or delete stories. Cannot publish issues.
entry.translation: Cun edd, ideet oor delete-a stureees. Cunnut poobleesh issooes.

entry.string: Choose which publication(s) to add new subscription:
entry.translation: Chuuse-a vheech poobleeceshun(s) tu edd noo soobscreepshun:

entry.string: Sorry - there are no publications available at this time.
entry.translation: Surry - zeere-a ere-a nu poobleeceshuns efeeeleble-a et thees teeme-a.

entry.string: You are about to delete a subscription.
entry.translation: Yuoo ere-a ebuoot tu delete-a a soobscreepshun.

entry.string: Choose which publication(s) to modify subscription:
entry.translation: Chuuse-a vheech poobleeceshun(s) tu mudeeffy soobscreepshun:

entry.string: Default Number of Days before Link Expires:
entry.translation: Deffoolt Noomber ooff Deys beffure-a Leenk Ixpures:

entry.string: Number of Days before Link Expires:
entry.translation: Noomber ooff Deys beffure-a Leenk Ixpures:

entry.string: Choose which publication(s) you would like to subscribe to:
entry.translation: Chuuse-a vheech poobleeceshun(s) yuoo vuoold leeke-a tu soobscreebe-a tu:

entry.string: You must register before you can subscribe to an program area.
entry.translation: Yuoo moost regeester beffure-a yuoo cun soobscreebe-a tu un prugrem erea.

entry.string: You must choose an issue to preview.
entry.translation: Yuoo moost chuuse-a un issooe-a tu prefeeoo.
